Aditya Amatya
Yatri Motorcycles

CAE Engineer

I am an Engineer and I enjoy solving problems.

Research Interests:

  • Solid Mechanics
  • MultiBody Dynamics
  • Finite Element Methods
  • Vehicle Dynamics
  • Computational Mechanics
  • Machine Design
  • Multi-Physics Simulations

Apart from my academic pursuits, I find enjoyment in playing chess, reading books, hiking, and admiring the beauty of nature.
